data.message: I have been trying to enter yesterday and today and the website states that i have entered the wrong pin?? i have used lots of codes, so surely it cant be that?

replies.message: Hi Emma, we're sorry to hear you're having problems entering your code. Please could you PM us a screenshot of the error as well as a photo of your code so that we can look into this for you. Thanks
I have tried again today and now it's working. 😊

Hi Emma, we're sorry to hear this. We'd recommend clearing the cookies on your browser before trying to enter again. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) to help you troubleshoot. Thanks
